Name: timestamp
Comments: timestamp for data between engine and arduino

Name: usr_right
Comments: Set of ultrasonic sensor readings on the right

Name: usr_left
Comments: Set of ultrasonic sensor reading on the left

Name: usr_front
Comments: Set of ultrasonic sensor readings on the front

Name: usr_rear
Comments: Set of ultrasonic sensor readings on the rear

Name: ir_front
Comments: Set of ir sensor readings on the front

Name: ir_rear
Comments: Set of ir sensor readings on the rear

Name: angle
Comments: The angle reading from the magnetometer.

Name: angle_cmd
Comments: Angle commanded by the calculation engine.

Name: exit
Comments: Turn off the engine by making this to 67
